verses.arabic: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
verses.english: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Mũ, Mun saukar da shi (Alƙur'ãni) a cikin Lailatul ƙadari (daren daraja)

verses.english: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
verses.hausa: To, me ya sanar da kai abin da ake cewa Lailatul ¡adari?

verses.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.english: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
verses.hausa: Lailatul ¡adari mafi alheri ne daga wasu watanni dubu.

verses.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.english: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
verses.hausa: Mala'iku da Rũhi suna sauka a cikinsa da iznin Ubangijinsu sabõda kowane umurni.

verses.english: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
verses.hausa: Sallama ne shi daren, har fitar alfijiri.
